column2:
"...good work. Once again, I think those
were good moves.
They're ideal for a Force."

"...I understand why everyone's talking
about you. When I see your abilities,
I want to talk to someone about them."

"...that was a bit of a tangent.
Here is your reward for this.
Thanks for going with me."

"...that's all for now. See you.
I'll be looking forward to having
another chance to work with you."

"……お疲れ様。
改めて、いい動きだったと思う。
フォースとして、理想的。"

"……皆が噂する理由もわかる。
貴方の実力を見れば
誰かに話したくなるから。"

"……話が逸れたわね。
これ、今回の依頼の報酬。
付き合ってくれて、ありがとう。"

"……それじゃ、私はこれで。
また機会があったら、よろしくね。"
